title: Super Bowl Picks Special (Football 02/02)
description:
Will Brinson, Pete Prisco and Jason La Canfora bring you the Pick Six podcast from Radio Row in Minnesota, extensively previewing Super Bowl LII and issuing their respective picks on the spread, plus a few fun props. Then, Nick Kostos, holding it down in the Florida studios, gives some of his top bets for Sunday!
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
